page.title: 12GRAPH OF LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
A GRAPH TO SHOW HOW MANY CHILDREN AGED {7_11}OUT OF A POSSIBLE{118}TAKE PART IN THESE POPULAR LEISURE ACTIVITIES.
{DANCING ^xxxx} SWIMMING @^x {CHESS ^x { } BROWNIES,GUIDES, CUBS AND SCOUTS @@@^*xx { FISHING @*x { }CYCLING @@@xxx {MUSIC ^*xxxx { }FOOTBALL @*xxx {FRENCH ^xxxx} BIRD WATCHING ^*xxx
{@=20 children ^=10 children {*= 5 children x= 1 child Belonging to Brownie, Guide, Cub and Scout groups was the most popular activity.Chess was the least popular. BMX cycling stunts increasing.
